pullrequest.title: Fix gazebo8 build in yakkety: avcodec proper version check

content.raw:
I'm not being able to install libavdevice on Xenial. Cmake gives me a warning:

~~~
libavdevice not found. Recording to a video device will be disabled.
~~~

And when trying to install dependencies:

~~~
$ sudo apt install libavdevice-dev libavformat-dev libavcodec-dev 
...
libavcodec-dev is already the newest version (7:2.8.10-0ubuntu0.16.04.1).
libavdevice-dev is already the newest version (7:2.8.10-0ubuntu0.16.04.1).
libavformat-dev is already the newest version (7:2.8.10-0ubuntu0.16.04.1).
~~~

What do I need to install to use `libavdevice`?
content.html:
I'm not being able to install libavdevice on Xenial. Cmake gives me a warning:

libavdevice not found. Recording to a video device will be disabled.

And when trying to install dependencies:

$ sudo apt install libavdevice-dev libavformat-dev libavcodec-dev 
...
libavcodec-dev is already the newest version (7:2.8.10-0ubuntu0.16.04.1).
libavdevice-dev is already the newest version (7:2.8.10-0ubuntu0.16.04.1).
libavformat-dev is already the newest version (7:2.8.10-0ubuntu0.16.04.1).

What do I need to install to use libavdevice?

pullrequest.title: Fix gazebo8 build in yakkety: avcodec proper version check

content.raw:
Umm interesting. Could you try this patch:

```diff
diff -r 7e05455fa02b cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake
--- a/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake	Tue Jan 17 01:50:28 2017 +0100
+++ b/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake	Thu Jan 19 02:43:00 2017 +0100
@@ -420,7 +420,7 @@
   ########################################
   # Find AV device. Only check for this on linux.
   if (UNIX)
-    pkg_check_modules(libavdevice libavdevice>="56.4.100")
+    pkg_check_modules(libavdevice libavdevice>=56.4.100)
     if (NOT libavdevice_FOUND)
       BUILD_WARNING ("libavdevice not found. Recording to a video device will be disabled.")
     else()
```

Yakkety, which ships a greater version of the pkg-config file does not suffer from this problem. If the patch works for you, feel free to get it into this PR and merge.
content.html:
Umm interesting. Could you try this patch:

diff -r 7e05455fa02b cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake
--- a/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake    Tue Jan 17 01:50:28 2017 +0100
+++ b/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake    Thu Jan 19 02:43:00 2017 +0100
@@ -420,7 +420,7 @@
   ########################################
   # Find AV device. Only check for this on linux.
   if (UNIX)
-    pkg_check_modules(libavdevice libavdevice>="56.4.100")
+    pkg_check_modules(libavdevice libavdevice>=56.4.100)
     if (NOT libavdevice_FOUND)
       BUILD_WARNING ("libavdevice not found. Recording to a video device will be disabled.")
     else()

Yakkety, which ships a greater version of the pkg-config file does not suffer from this problem. If the patch works for you, feel free to get it into this PR and merge.

content.html: Yup, that works! Merged: 1b80630

pullrequest.title: Fix gazebo8 build in yakkety: avcodec proper version check

content.raw: we also have a [common::AVPacketUnref](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/7e05455fa02be07d7bbcc53e0f7003ff9558ef37/gazebo/common/ffmpeg_inc.cc?at=gazebo8_fix_yakkety&fileviewer=file-view-default#ffmpeg_inc.cc-44) function. Do we need to update the version check there?
content.html: we also have a common::AVPacketUnref function. Do we need to update the version check there?

pullrequest.title: Fix gazebo8 build in yakkety: avcodec proper version check

content.raw: `av_packet_unref` exists from [at least version 2.6](https://ffmpeg.org/doxygen/2.6/group__lavc__packet.html#ga63d5a489b419bd5d45cfd09091cbcbc2) and our supported distributions in Ubuntu starts with 2.8.6 (Xenial) so I think that the function could be removed or just wrap `av_packet_unref`.
content.html: av_packet_unref exists from at least version 2.6 and our supported distributions in Ubuntu starts with 2.8.6 (Xenial) so I think that the function could be removed or just wrap av_packet_unref.
